RUSH COUNTY VICTIMS ASSISTANCE SERVES TO PROVIDE ASSISTANCE AND SHELTER TO BATTERED WOMEN AND VICTIMS OF DOMESTIC ABUSE.
RUSH COUNTY VICTIMS ASSISTANCE PROVIDED ASSISTANCE AND SHELTER TO 401 WOMEN THROUGHOUT RUSH COUNTY IN 2010.

CHANGES MADE TO THE ORGANIZING OR GOVERNING DOCUMENTS: 1. CHANGED THE REQUIRED/ALLOWABLE NUMBER OF DIRECTORS TO NOT LESS THAN 10, BUT NOT MORE THAN 16. ALSO, DID AWAY WITH TERM LIMITATION ON DULY ELECTED, QUALIFIED DIRECTORS SERVING ON THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. 2.ADDED THE QUALIFICATION THAT FOR THE BOARD TO REMOVE A DIRECTOR, EACH DIRECTOR MUST BE GIVEN AT LEAST 7 DAYS WRITTEN NOTICE THAT THE MATTER WILL BE VOTED UPON AT A DIRECTORS MEETING.... ALSO, A PARAGRAPH WAS ADDED TO THE BYLAWS INDICATING THAT ACTION REQUIRED COULD BE TAKEN BY THE BOARD WITHOUT A MEETING AS LONG AS THE ACTION IS TAKEN BY ALL OF THE DULY ELECTED AND QULAIFIED DIRECTORS OF THE CORPORATION AS EVIDENCED APPROPRIATELY BY THE BYLAW RULES. 3.TERM LIMITATIONS REMOVED FROM THE APPOINTED OFFICES OF PRESIDENT, VICE-PRESIDENT, SECRETARY, AND/OR TREASURER. 4. LIMITATION ADDED TO THE POSITION OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR. WITH THE ADDED LIMITATIONS, THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR MAY NOT BE ELECTED TO SERVE ON THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS NOR HAVE VOTING PRIVILEGES. 5. CHANGED THE CONSISTENCY OF THE NOMINATING COMMITTEE. ORIGINALLY, ONLY 2 OF THE FOUR MEMBERS OF THE COMMITTEE COULD BE DIRECTORS OF THE CORPORATION. NOW, ALL MEMBERS OF THE NOMINATING COMMITTEE CAN BE DIRECTORS OF THE CORPORATION AS WELL. 6. REMOVED THE 1) SITE SELECTION COMMITTEE AND 2) THE PERSON POWER COMMITTEE FROM THE LIST OF OPERATING COMMITTEES NEEDED/REQUIRED. THESE TWO COMMITTES ARE NO LONGER APPLICABLE OR REQUIRED FOR THE FUNCTION OF RUSH COUNTY VICTIM'S ASSISTANCE. 7. TOOK OUT THE WORD "MEMBERS" IN THE FOLLOWING SENTENCE AND REPLACED WITH "TRUSTEES, DIRECTORS, OFFICERS, OR OTHER PRIVATE PERSONS": NO PART OF THE NET EARNINGS OF THE CORPORATION SHALL...BE DISTRIBUTABLE TO ITS TRUSTEES, DIRECTORS, OFFICERS, OR OTHER PRIVATE PERSONS, EXCEPT THE CORPORATION SHALL BE AUTHORIZED/ENPOWERED TO REASONABLY COMPENSATE FOR SERVICES RENDERED OR TO MAKE PAYMENTS/DISTRIBUTIONS IN FURTHERANCE OF THE PURPOSES SET FORTH IN THE ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION.
